inclusion.criterion: Female subjects with Y material will be allowed providing gonadectomies have been performed previously
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects have completed or nearly completed their linear growth
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: treats with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy to avoid menarche and reach the ideal height

inclusion.criterion: Previous growth hormone (GH) therapy discontinued at least 6 months prior to study participation
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: treats with GH since 6 months ago

inclusion.criterion: Stable thyroid replacement therapy will be allowed
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Celiac disease on stable diets will be allowed
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Any previous hormone replacement therapy (HRT) will be allowed
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetes Mellitus on insulin therapy, insulin sensitizers or oral hypoglycemics
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: TSH was 3 and FBS was 75 in the latest lab study

exclusion.criterion: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease), celiac disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any other chronic conditions, that, in the opinion of investigators could impair the metabolism of nutrients
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe obesity, i.e., Body Mass Index (BMI) >95th centile
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome and is on GH therapy. She does not have diabetes or inflammatory bowel disease.
